de.must.dataobj
Interface DataChangeListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDataListFrame, ColumnDataListFrame, CurrentUser, DataComboBox, DataComboBox, DataList, DataList, DataSelectDialog, FrAddrBufferSl, FrDtaAcc, FrKontaktSl, FrSelection, FrUserSl, HalfDataComboBox, HalfDataComboBox, SimpleDataListFrame, SimpleDataSelectDialog
public interface DataChangeListener

Data change listener. Used for synchronization of data presentations, e.g. to update a ComboBox when a new entry was added by an administration.
